name: videoPlayer
description: Component for playing video media files

propSpec.name: value
propSpec.desc: The source where to get the video from

propSpec.name: width
propSpec.desc: A string specifying the width of the video player

propSpec.name: height
propSpec.desc: A string specifying the height of the video player

propSpec.name: controls
propSpec.desc: When true, the video player's controls will be shown

propSpec.name: autoPlay
propSpec.desc: When true, the video player will autoplay

propSpec.name: type
propSpec.desc: A string that specifies the type of video being played

propSpec.name: hasLabel
propSpec.desc: When true, the video player will have a label
